kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/users path_url=/users headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Verify Get Single User Not Found

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Run Keyword And Expect Error
GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/users/99 path_url=/users/99 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
HTTPError: 404 Client Error: NOT FOUND for url: http://127.0.0.1:5000/users/99
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.status: HTTPError: 404 Client Error: NOT FOUND for url: http://127.0.0.1:5000/users/99

kw.msg: ${response} = HTTPError: 404 Client Error: NOT FOUND for url: http://127.0.0.1:5000/users/99
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and checks that the expected error occurred.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/users path_url=/users headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '33', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Hema", "job": "Tester"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
